happy.description: A positive emotional state of joy, satisfaction, or uplifted mood.

sad.description: A low emotional state often linked with feelings of loss or disappointment.

stressed.description: Feeling pressure or overwhelm due to tasks, expectations, or deadlines.

anxious.description: A state of worry, nervousness, or fear of uncertain outcomes.

angry.description: A strong emotional response to frustration, unfairness, or violation of expectations.

neutral.description: A balanced emotional state without strong positive or negative feelings.
